SEARCH
Package DataAccess

Class AbstractDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
DataAccess.AbstractDAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of object
Direct Known Subclasses:
CustomerDAO, OrdersDAO, ProductsDAO
public class AbstractDAO<T> extends Object
This class is an abstract data access object (DAO) that provides common functionality for interacting with a database. It is parameterized with the type of object it handles.

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      public List<T> findAll()
      Retrieves all objects of type T from the database.
      Returns:
      A list containing all objects of type T found in the database. If no objects are found, an empty list is returned.

    • findById

      public T findById(int id)
      Retrieves an object of type T based on the provided ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID used to retrieve the object.
      Returns:
      An object of type T with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • getTable

      public DefaultTableModel getTable(List<T> list)
      Retrieves a DefaultTableModel object representing the table data based on the provided list of objects.
      Parameters:
      list - The list of objects to populate the table data.
      Returns:
      A DefaultTableModel object representing the table data.

    • insert

      public int insert(T t) throws IllegalAccessException, SQLException
      Inserts an object of type T into the database.
      Parameters:
      t - The object to be inserted into the database.
      Returns:
      The auto-generated ID of the inserted object.
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException - If there is an illegal access to a field during the insertion process.
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • update

      public T update(T t, int id_value)
      Updates an object of type T in the database based on the given ID value.
      Parameters:
      t - The object to be updated in the database.
      id_value - The ID value used to identify the object to be updated.
      Returns:
      The updated object.

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice(int id_p)
      Retrieves the price of a product based on the given product ID.
      Parameters:
      id_p - The ID of the product.
      Returns:
      The price of the product.

    • delete

      public int delete(T t, int id_value)
      Deletes a record from the database based on the given object and ID value.
      Parameters:
      t - The object to delete.
      id_value - The ID value of the record to delete.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected by the deletion.

    • getQuantity

      public int getQuantity(int id_p)
      Retrieves the quantity of a product based on the given product ID.
      Parameters:
      id_p - The ID of the product.
      Returns:
